typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MeterCode as string,
		Serial as string,
		PlantCode as string,
		DateTime as string,
		Quality as string,
		Stream as string,
		DataType as string,
		Energy as double,
		Units as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['TOU*.csv']) ~> TOUSource
TOUSource aggregate(groupBy(MeterCode,
		DateTime,
		DataType),
	{Average Value} = avg({Energy})) ~> TOUAggregate
TOUAggregate sink() ~> sink1
